picoxlsx4j.style

Class Border

  • java.lang.Object
    • picoxlsx4j.style.Border
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Border>

    public class Border
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Border>
    Class representing a Border entry. The Border entry is used to define frames and cell borders
